title: QA: npm package and CLI binary validation
description: Verify TASK-026 and TASK-027 results: test npm pack output, verify tarball has correct files, test global install, test all CLI commands work from installed package. Write validation tests if possible.

comments.text:
QA complete. 18 validation tests written and passing (232 total). Findings:

BUG (HIGH): 44 test files leak into npm tarball. tsc compiles __tests__ into dist/ and package.json files:["dist"] includes everything. Fix: either exclude tests in tsconfig (separate tsconfig.build.json) or add .npmignore with dist/**/__tests__/.

PASS: package.json has correct bin, files, engines, type, prepublishOnly fields.
PASS: dist/cli.js has shebang line.
PASS: CLI --version, --help, all subcommands work from built dist.
PASS: Global install via npm install -g works, mx-lite binary resolves correctly.
PASS: README included in tarball.
Approved. Critical bug escalated to TASK-033.
